title: Diana needs a line removed from her VO
body:
"Bring down the sun."
It just doesn't work with the direction you want to take her. Which is uniting the Lunari and Solari religions. Ideally a new VO would be good because what she currently talks about is completely based on vengeance.

Then what is the context? In her previous lore she loved the moon and studied it until she found mention of the Lunari and eventually found a hidden Lunari temple which held the armor and sword she uses now. She brought this back to the Solari and told them about it and they called her a heretic and wanted to execute her. She retaliated and killed them. She hated the Solari and wants anyone who isn't willing to worship the moon dead. Now her quote matches up with this story where she wants revenge on the Solari not a story where she knows that they have to work together.

See? You don't get the context, it was never about hating the solari, it was always about the truth.

When she say "Bring down the sun." she doesn't mean literally "bye bye sun", thats stupid, she meant the Solari religion with their blind following that condemned her as an heretic.

She is not NOW trying to be friendly with the solari, the first thing she did when she knew the truth was to TELL to the elders, so they co-exist in armony, what she wanted is to take down the corrupt Solari religion.

Wich, you know what? Is still what she wants, but here is a diference, she ALREADY did, Leona is now the leader, and she too knows.
